publicationStmt.p: Shared among researchers of "Manoscritti preziosi del Piemonte: acquisizione e disseminazione in forma digitale" project.

msContents.textLang: The language in this manuscript is Medieval Latin, South Germanic area.

supportDesc.p: Sec. IX metà o terzo quarto; membr., ff. 156, mm. 280 x 240 (215 x 195), 28 linee di testo.

revisionDesc.change: Set validation on custom schema; added facs attribute for each <pb> element, resized and put images in the relevant folder; fixed minor encoding errors; added Einhard to person list.
